name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
This is a private interview I had with a Foxconn employee who participated in the entire incident and provided me with continuous information tonight. With the consent of the other party, the content is made public. I hope that through his perspective, as a supplement to today's full-day video, everyone can understand this matter more deeply from another side.

Full document address:
https://t.co/1WTqI2Z5Zy

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Well, I haven't received any new updates so far. Considering that Foxconn uses the government's credibility to guarantee tomorrow, I have to go to bed now and try to wake up in China time, so that I can convey the voices of Foxconn workers as soon as possible.
I hope the workers can sleep well tonight.
Finally, I'll give you a good movie. Good night, everyone.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
I would also like to remind you that Foxconn is very large, and this is just one perspective.
I hope you can understand.
At the same time, I am very grateful to this friend for providing the videos these two days, and I hope he is safe.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ

Foxconn latest news
An employee said that now everyone is queuing up to go to the train station to take the train home, and many people bring blankets with them because they are worried that they will not be able to enter the station or leave after arriving, so they have to sleep near the station.
This means that if these people cannot leave before the silence at 0:00 on the 25th in Zhengzhou, tens of thousands of people may be stranded near the train station.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
CCTV had a major live broadcast accident
During the World Cup Spain match, a suspected East Turkestan flag appeared in the stands. It was not censored during the live broadcast. After that, CCTV and domestic network platforms did not provide full-match replays after the live broadcast, and only produced censored highlights of the game. CCTV5 scheduled two replays of the Japanese match during the day today, but no replay of the Spanish match.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Currently, there are very few discussions on Weibo about the censorship of this game, and most of them are concentrated today, which can prove that CCTV did not censor the game during the live broadcast.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
A major live broadcast accident turned into a major live broadcast blunder
Some netizens discovered that the flag in the video was the Iraqi Turkish Manni, who are mainly distributed in the Turkish Manni area, with the largest number in Kirkuk, generally believed to have a population of about three million. They are the third largest ethnic group in Iraq.

The person in charge of Foxconn just issued a new emergency notice
I hope that the employees who have not left will stay and continue to work, and their salary will remain the same. They can earn more than 20,000 yuan by the New Year
Employees who make trouble and leave may be blacklisted by all large electronic companies, and will never be hired again, and will have no jobs in the future
The contributor said that even so, most people still choose to leave and do not plan to stay.

At the same time, our current situation is that many dormitory buildings are fully sealed off and isolated, but we have not notified why they are sealed off: the quarantine meals are poor, and the group is often muted.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On November 21, a video was circulated online showing a female high school teacher in Xinmi, Henan, being abused while giving an online class to her students.
The video showed that a man rushed into the screen while the teacher was giving an online class and the teacher was strangled by the man, and then the two left the online class camera.
On November 23, the staff of Qingping Street Police Station informed that the two had reconciled and the teacher was in good health. According to an informed student of the school, the school students called the police after the incident.

content:
Chongqing Superman Brother Video 1
Today, a man with a Superman backpack stood at the gate of a community in Chongqing,
swearing that the epidemic prevention personnel were running dogs and criticizing the sky-high price of carrots
During the period, golden sentences were frequently mentioned, and the surrounding citizens applauded
"There is only one disease in the world, that is, lack of freedom and poverty, and we have both now. We are still struggling for a minor cold"
"The municipal government is wrong, and it can only keep making mistakes, otherwise someone must be held responsible."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Chongqing Superman Brother Video 2

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Chongqing Superman Brother Video 3
The man continued to make remarks that everyone should not be defeated by the epidemic, which attracted the police, who wanted to forcibly arrest him, but was finally rescued by the neighbors around him

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Chongqing Superman Brother Video 4
The police tried to use violence to take the man away, and the man shouted "Help me"
Then the residents forcibly rescued the man from the police and cheered and sent him away. At this moment, he was a real superman!
According to the submission of the community owner, he has now been taken home by his parents and left the community without being arrested.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Breaking news! Foxconn 2.0 clashes again tonight
It is reported that a group of employees who were quarantined in hotels and did not enter the park to get their work badges also demanded compensation of 10,000 yuan, but the government was only willing to give 2,400 yuan, not a cent more.
In the video, both sides gathered in front of a government building, and some people in the crowd shouted "The police killed people" and "Why don't you catch the black intermediaries?"
Afterwards, the workers tried to enter the government building and clashed outside the door. The police used pepper spray to disperse the crowd

content: A fire broke out in a high-rise building in a residential area in Urumqi, Xinjiang. The contributor said that the fire had been burning for more than half an hour but the fire truck did not come, and when it came, it could not enter the residential area. When the fire was still small, the door was sealed and people could not go downstairs, so everyone had to hide on the roof.
